name: Van Damnation
description:
Was originally going to be a One Button game. I added another button.

IMPORTANT: There is a gamebreaking bug in level 2 currently, I screwed something up... I'm looking into it.

The game automatically scrolls and you must time the spacebar when your opponent swings at you to block and defeat them! Control does the splits which is quite useful for manipulating things and killing small animals.
